name: helplessly
content:

in a way that is helpless (= unable to do anything to help yourself or anyone else): Unable to swim, he watched helplessly as the child struggled desperately in the water. Residents watched helplessly as water rushed into their homes. See
helpless
More examplesFewer examplesWhen they found him, he had been lying helplessly on the floor for hours.His wife Francesca waited helplessly outside but he never reappeared. He is helplessly in love with her.He looked on helplessly as his partner died in his arms.
